nodes.id: 中华人民共和国外交部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部
en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China

location.zh-cn: 北京市朝阳区朝阳门南大街2号
location.en: No. 2, Chaoyangmen South Street, Chaoyang District, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管外交事务的组成部门。
description.en: A component department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China in charge of foreign affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国外交部部长、中共中央政治局委员、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Minister of Foreign Affairs, a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, and Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国外交部党委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Party Committee Secretary of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，现任中华人民共和国外交部常务副部长，正部长级。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, currently serving as the Executive Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the PRC, with the rank of a full minister.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中央外事工作委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中央外事工作委员会办公室
en: Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央外事工作委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission of the Communist Party of China.

en: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部的前身，是1949年至1954年间中央人民政府的外交主管机构。
description.en: The predecessor to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PRC, it was the foreign affairs organ of the Central People's Government from 1949 to 1954.

description.zh-cn: 中央人民政府外交部的前身机构，成立于1947年5月。
description.en: The predecessor organization of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Central People's Government, established in May 1947.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)
中华人民共和国中央人民政府

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1949年至1954年期间的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The supreme state authority of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理、外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese statesman, military leader, and diplomat, one of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council and Minister of Foreign Affairs.

nodes.id: 第一届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第一届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的第一届最高国家权力机关，于1954年9月召开第一次会议，通过了《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: The first session of the highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China, which convened its first session in September 1954 and passed the Constitution of the PRC.

nodes.id: 中国亚洲经济发展协会

zh-cn: 中国亚洲经济发展协会

description.zh-cn: 原由中华人民共和国外交部主管的社会团体，2020年与外交部脱钩。
description.en: A social organization formerly supervised by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PRC, which was decoupled from the ministry in 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、外交家、诗人，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一，曾任外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese military commander, diplomat, and poet, one of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交家，曾任外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交家，曾任外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交家，曾任外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交家，曾任外交部部长、国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、外交家，曾任外交部部长、国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician and diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and Vice Premier of the State Council.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交家，曾任外交部部长、国务委员。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交家，曾任外交部部长。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交家，曾任外交部部长、中央外事工作委员会办公室主任。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and Director of the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任外交部部长、国务委员。
description.en: Chinese diplomat, who served as Minister of Foreign Affairs and State Councilor.

nodes.id: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会驻外交部纪检监察组

zh-cn: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会驻外交部纪检监察组
中央纪委国家监委驻外交部纪检监察组

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会、中华人民共和国国家监察委员会派驻中华人民共和国外交部的纪检监察机构。
description.en: The disciplinary and supervisory agency dispatched to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs by the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC and the National Supervisory Commission of the PRC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal-control institution of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部直属的唯一一所培养外交外事、国际问题研究和涉外经济、法律人才的高等学校。
description.en: The only institution of higher learning directly affiliated with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PRC, dedicated to cultivating talents in diplomacy, foreign affairs, international studies, and foreign-related economics and law.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部是中华人民共和国国务院的组成部门，在组织上隶属于国务院。
description.en: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs is a constituent department of the State Council and is organizationally subordinate to it.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部
relationships.target: 中央外事工作委员会办公室

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国外交部在业务上接受中央外事工作委员会办公室的指导。
description.en: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs receives professional guidance from the Office of the Central Foreign Affairs Commission.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 1954年9月，第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议后，中央人民政府外交部改名为中华人民共和国外交部，并接替其相关工作。
description.en: In September 1954, after the first session of the 1st National People's Congress, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Central People's Government was renamed the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China and took over its functions.

relationships.target: 中央人民政府外交部

description.zh-cn: 1949年10月1日，以中共中央外事组为基础，成立了中央人民政府外交部。
description.en: On October 1, 1949, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Central People's Government was established on the basis of the Foreign Affairs Group of the CCP Central Committee.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)
relationships.target: 中央人民政府外交部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府成立后，设立了中央人民政府外交部。
description.en: After the establishment of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Central People's Government was created.

relationships.source: 第一届全国人民代表大会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 1954年9月，第一届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过了《中华人民共和国国务院组织法》，促使中央人民政府外交部改组为中华人民共和国外交部。
description.en: In September 1954, the first session of the 1st National People's Congress passed the 'Organic Law of the State Council of the PRC', which led to the reorganization of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Central People's Government into the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PRC.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国外交部
relationships.target: 中国亚洲经济发展协会

description.zh-cn: 根据国家改革意见，原由外交部主管的中国亚洲经济发展协会与外交部分离，不再设置业务主管单位。
description.en: According to national reform guidelines, the China-Asia Economic Development Association, formerly supervised by the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, was decoupled from the ministry, and its business supervisory unit was eliminated.

relationships.source: 中央纪律检查委员会国家监察委员会驻外交部纪检监察组
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中央纪委国家监委驻外交部纪检监察组是中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会、中华人民共和国国家监察委员会的派驻机构。
description.en: The Discipline Inspection and Supervision Group stationed at the Ministry of Foreign Affairs is a dispatched agency of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CPC and the National Supervisory Commission of the PRC.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国外交部

description.zh-cn: 外交学院是中华人民共和国外交部的直属事业单位。
description.en: China Foreign Affairs University is a public institution directly under the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the PRC.
